code: import img1 from"../../../assets/imgs/service/SLA-1-600x747.png";import ServiceGetStarted from"../../../components/ServiceGetStarted";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var paraData=[{id:1,title:"Produce smart contracts that are easily adaptable to your SLAs",content:"Manage your service contracts for customers and vendors through Skyz Service.
